forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 61. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the early hours of Thursday in Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere is shrouded in a gentle, velvety gray, reminiscent of a whispering secret. The temperature rests at a comfortable 52 degrees, suggesting that a light layer may be your most trusted companion as you step outside. As the sun gradually embarks on its journey through the sky, the clouds will part to reveal moments of sunshine—unexpected bursts of warmth among the cool caresses of the southwest wind, which dances softly at speeds of 5 to 10 mph.

The day ahead promises a high of approximately 61 degrees, allowing for a seamless transition from the cozy confines of your home to the bustling streets alive with possibility. With the lingering marine layer perhaps softening the skyline, pockets of mist may cling to the bridges and hills, lending a hazy charm as they weave through the cityscape. This moderate visibility invites you to explore local cafés, perhaps to sip on a steaming cup of coffee as the city awakens or to stroll through one of the nearby parks, relishing the fresh air. Opt for a light jacket over a breathable top, and maybe slip your feet into comfortable sneakers to fully embrace the adventure that awaits in this tranquil, yet vibrant urban landscape.
